Function Documentation

gint gqr_legendre_integrals ( gint  N,
gdouble *  I,
gdouble *  P 
)

Process a list of integrals of powers on a weight function to generate the integrals of the corresponding Legendre polynomials.

Parameters:
N number of integrals in list
I integrals for
P on output integrals , for
Returns:
